name: UNDETECTED - Prototype
description:
Undetected is a little prototype we did for a main college project.

It's thought as a top down stealth game with the main mechanic being the ability to switch between 3 different characters, each charcater having a different unique ability to disable the different obstacles: Cameras, guards and lasers. Each character can disable each type of obstacle but with a cooldown.

The prototype features 3 levels, coins to collect and for getting a highscore and a short but well rounded story with an intro and an ending.

The game takes around 10 minutes to finish
